mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.wrhs.mapper.RawMtrWrhsMapper.selectRawMtrWrhs */ WP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , WP.WGHNO AS WGHNO , WP.PLTNO AS PLTNO , WP.WRHS_YMD AS WRHS_YMD , WP.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , WP.VHCLNO AS VHCLNO , WP.BX_QNTT AS BX_QNTT , WP.WRHS_WGHT AS WRHS_WGHT , WP.RMRK AS RMRK , WP.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_RAW_MTR_WRHS_PRFMNC WP WHERE WP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND WP.WRHSNO = #{wrhsno}
